sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import ReactAnimatedWeather from 'react-animated-weather'; export default function Weather() { let weatherData = { city: "Lviv", temperature: 22, date: "Tuesday 10:00", description: "Cloudy", imgUrl: "./01d.svg", humidity: 80, wind: 10 }; return (
last update: {weatherData.date}

{weatherData.city}

{weatherData.description}

{weatherData.temperature}

°C |°F
Humidity: {weatherData.humidity}%
Wind: {weatherData.wind} km/h
This project was coded by Liubov Shupik and is open-sourced on GitHub and hosted on Netlify
); }
